Donald Rumsfeld 's paper was given to the White House only two weeks after President Bush had approved a US military operation in Afghanistan directed against Osama bin Laden and the Taliban regime. Despite that decision, Donald Rumsfeld 's proposal called explicitly for postponing indefinitely US airstrikes and the use of ground forces in support of the anti-Taliban Northern Alliance in order to try to catch Osama bin Laden . the Donald Rumsfeld paper argued that the US should target states that had supported anti-Israel forces such as Hezbollah and Hamas. . Kyle Korver was mobbed by his wildly celebrating teammates. Boston players sat dazed on the bench. A third overtime was on deck. Allen Iverson simply pumped his fist, his face expressionless as if he expected it. Kyle Korver hit that big shot and I was thinking, "If he hit that shot, we've got to win it, he said. After Kyle Korver sent the game into a third overtime, Chris Webber delivered a clutch steal and secured the Philadelphia 76ers" 125-124 victory over the Celtics on Friday night.
